quora.template: I'm an administrator on the website Quora. There are two posts, one that asks "{{question1}}" and another that asks "{{question2}}". I can merge questions if they are asking the same thing. Can I merge these two questions? ||| {{ answer_choices[label] }}

same thing.template: Are the questions "{{question1}}" and "{{question2}}" asking the same thing? ||| {{ answer_choices[label] }}

answer.template: Can an answer to "{{question1}}" also be used to answer "{{question2}}"? ||| {{ answer_choices[label] }}

duplicate.template: I received the questions "{{question1}}" and "{{question2}}". Are they duplicates? ||| {{ answer_choices[label] }}
